name: Orthopedics
description: Orthopedic surgery or orthopedics is the branch of surgery concerned with conditions involving the musculoskeletal system.

name: Radiology
description: Radiology is a specialty that uses medical imaging to diagnose and treat diseases seen within the body.

name: Intensive care
description: Intensive care unit is a special department of a hospital or health care facility that provides intensive treatment medicine.

name: Cardiology
description: Cardiology is a branch of medicine dealing with disorders of the heart as well as parts of the circulatory system.

name: Plastic Surgery
description: Surgery is a branch of medicine concerned with diseases and conditions requiring or amenable to operative or manual procedures.

name: Diagnostic Center
description: Mammography is the process of using low-energy X-rays to examine the human breast for diagnosis and screening.

name: Anaesthetics
description: In the practice of medicine (especially surgery and dentistry), anesthesia is a state of temporary induced loss of sensation or awareness.

name: Cardiac Wellness
description: Cardiovascular fitness is the ability of the heart, blood cells and lungs to supply oxygen-rich blood to the working muscle tissues and the ability of the muscles to use oxygen to produce energy for movement.
